#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n,m,o,t,i,c;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        c=0;
        scanf("%d%d%d",&n,&m,&o);
        int l[n];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            {
                scanf("%d",&l[i]);
                if(l[i]>=o&&c<m)
                    c++;
            }
        if(l[0]>=o)
            {
                printf("%d",c);
                cout<<endl;
            }
        else
            cout<<-1<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
